help.joinSupportServer: Join my server for more news, events, giveaways and more! We will love to hear your feedback. {{invite}}
help.uanvailableDM: It seems that your DM (Direct messages) is closed and that is why I was unable to send you the message.
help.lookDM: Could you have a look at your DM (Direct Messages) please?

embed.title: {{emoji}} Ritsu's Help
embed.description:
Are you interested in my **commands**? Ooh, that's cool, feel free to see them down there.

If you have any questions, doubts or want support, do not hesitate to join **my support server**.
embed.footer: You can get more information about the commands at {{url}}

errors.noPrefix: You need to specify the prefix.
